vsParam:
Brilliant, the "Descent Battle" is finally about to start!
Thank god this "Descent Battle (Light)" won't rank our scores.

Captain Tandrion lost his monster for the "Descent Battle"...
Hmm! Anyway, there're many trivial things on our plate. Excuse us!

OK, our enemy is... a "Trick Caster"!
It's capable of various magic, pretty tough!

Plus, it's followed by Familiars! We do outnumber them,
but a many-to-many fight is still tough!

The number of fighters always counts! Use an all-target attack
to reduce our enemies to a great extent within ooooooone blow!

By the way, "Trick Casters" are vulnerable to Water Element!
A member who uses Water Element skills in the party will make our fight much easier!

If the enemy is too powerful to be defeated, we can challenge it
after enhancement! Sub gear ready? Taken your cuisines!?

As an alchemist, it comes really... really critical to get
fully prepared! It may be useful to take enough items with you!

Anyway... Let's fight with might and main!
I have faith in you!!
